site_name: Clarnico Quay, Eastwick, Development Parcel 5.3, Planning Delivery Zone 5 (PDZ 5), Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, London
description: Application under s73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for the variation of condition 2 (Temporary Buildings and Mobile Garden) of planning permission reference 18/00171/FUL dated 5 April 2018 for the construction of five buildings between 2 and 3 storeys providing 776sqm GIA of workshops/studios (B1); 131sqm GIA of maker/retail space (B1/A1); 417sqm GIA of shops, cafes and bars (A1/A3/A4); 633sqm GIA of pop-up shops, food hall and market stalls (A1/A3/A4); 490sqm GIA event/community space (Sui Generis); 37sqm GIA of community meeting rooms (D1); and associated cycle parking, servicing, management, lighting and landscape, a mobile garden, including associated buildings and structures, such as raised planters, storage containers, flexible programming space, boundary treatment and associated infrastructure, the buildings, structures and uses shall cease on or before  30th September 2025 when the land shall be restored to its current state.  Submission under s73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for the variation of: a) condition 2 (Temporary Buildings and Mobile Garden) of planning permission reference 18/00171/FUL dated 5 April 2018 to extend the date of the permission.  Planning permission for the construction of five buildings between 2 and 3 storeys providing 776sqm GIA of workshops/studios (B1); 131sqm GIA of maker/retail space (B1/A1); 417sqm GIA of shops, cafes and bars (A1/A3/A4); 633sqm GIA of pop-up shops, food hall and market stalls (A1/A3/A4); 490sqm GIA event/community space (Sui Generis); 37sqm GIA of community meeting rooms (D1); and associated cycle parking, servicing, management, lighting and landscape, a mobile garden, including associated buildings and structures, such as raised planters, storage containers, flexible programming space, boundary treatment and associated infrastructure, the buildings, structures and uses shall cease on or before 31st December 2027 and the structures shall be removed from the site and the land reinstated before the 31st January 2028; and b) Condition 3 (works in accordance with approved details) to include the revised Design and Access Statement Revision B September 2018.
